channel.description: Recent content in Development on Minute Media Tech and Product Blog

item.title: DIY: Creating a Great Relationship Between Dev & Design
item.description: A successful relationship between dev & design is key to achieving a good product. However, unfortunately in most places it is not the case. Today in Minute Media, designers and developers are working together in a good and healthy atmosphere - but it took a lot of work to get to this point, and it takes constant work to maintain it.
